long_description: With a smooth feel in the water that's perfect for all-around paddling, the BELUGA Distance kayak paddle delivers great overall value. Durable fiberglass-reinforced thermoplastic blades have a dihedral shape resulting in reduced paddle flutter and a smooth stroke. Corrosion-resistant aluminum shaft is designed to provide years of durable performance. Push-button breakdown allows easy storage and adjusts blade feathering angle 0deg or 30deg for right- or left-handed control. The BELUGA Distance kayak paddle features rubber drip rings to help keep hands and lap dry while paddling. Special buy.
short_description: With a smooth feel in the water that's perfect for all-around paddling, the BELUGA Distance kayak paddle delivers great overall value.
